data.prayer: Lord, please provide elders whose hearts are completely yours in every town in the state of Ouargla.
data.verse: The reason I left you in Crete was that you might put in order what was left unfinished and appoint elders in every town, as I directed you.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Ouargla, Algeria
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Father, put your Bible in the hands of the 191,054, who are far from you and live in this place.
data.verse: How can a young person stay on the path of purity? By living according to your Word. I seek you with all my heart; do not let me stray from your commands.

data.section_summary: On average, 10 people will die without Jesus in the next 100 hours in Ouargla, Algeria.
data.prayer: Father, send your gospel to these.
Jesus, like with the centurion who came to you for his sick servant, please call into your house those who have great faith but are not yet yours in the state of Ouargla
data.verse: When Jesus heard these things, he marveled at him, and turning to the crowd that followed him, said, “I tell you, not even in Israel have I found such faith.” And when those who had been sent returned to the house, they found the servant well.

data.prayer: Father, let love abound more and more in the church of Ouargla, Algeria.
data.verse: And this is my prayer: that your love may abound more and more in knowledge and depth of insight

data.prayer: Lord, I thank you that you will bring health and a cure to the Jew, French-speaking people. Reveal to them abundance of peace and truth.
Jesus, please help the 130 believers in the state of Ouargla to be filled with joyful obedience at all times, as you modeled for us all.
Father, please give the church in the state of Ouargla prophets who can build up holiness and faithfulness to you.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Father, help the 130 believers in Ouargla to be spiritually intentional with their relationships among their 191,070 lost friends and neighbors.
